#text=Tonight I road on a public bus .
#text=I waited outside of the store near my house for the bus which runs on a schedule .
#text=Once the bus came I got on and paid the bus fare .
#text=After that I took my seat I looked around at all the other people .
#text=When you ride on the bus there can be all types of people on the bus with you .
#text=I had my MP3 player with me with ear-buds so I put my ear-buds into my ears and turned on my MP3 player and began listening to my music .
#text=My public bus ride was n't very long so after a little while the bus stopped at my stop and I got off the bus and arrived at my destination .
#text=Riding on a public bus can be a fun experience if you want it to be and you can even talk to the other people on the public bus but overall I had a good experience .
